name: campaign_future_forecast
description:
Mart model that generates campaign performance forecasts for the next 3 months.
It utilizes historical monthly data from `stg_campaigns` to calculate trends,
seasonal factors (if applicable), and projects key metrics like Conversion Rate,
ROI, Acquisition Cost, and CTR using SQL-based time series techniques.
The model also provides 95% confidence intervals for the forecasts based on
historical volatility and includes both historical actuals and future projections.
Designed for use in performance forecasting dashboards and predictive analytics.

columns.name: Company
columns.description: The name of the company associated with the campaign data. Foreign key to stg_campaigns.Company.

columns.name: month_id
columns.description: Numeric representation of the year and month (YYYYMM), used for time series ordering. Unique identifier for a company-month combination.

columns.name: month
columns.description: The calendar month number (1-12).

columns.name: year
columns.description: The calendar year (e.g., 2022).

columns.name: conversion_rate
columns.description: Historical average conversion rate for the company in that specific month. Null for forecast periods.

columns.name: conversion_rate_forecast
columns.description: Projected average conversion rate for the company in a future month. Null for historical periods.

columns.name: conversion_rate_lower_bound
columns.description: Lower bound of the 95% confidence interval for the conversion rate forecast. Null for historical periods.

columns.name: conversion_rate_upper_bound
columns.description: Upper bound of the 95% confidence interval for the conversion rate forecast. Null for historical periods.

columns.name: roi
columns.description: Historical average Return on Investment (ROI) for the company in that specific month. Null for forecast periods.

columns.name: roi_forecast
columns.description: Projected average ROI for the company in a future month. Null for historical periods.

columns.name: roi_lower_bound
columns.description: Lower bound of the 95% confidence interval for the ROI forecast. Null for historical periods.

columns.name: roi_upper_bound
columns.description: Upper bound of the 95% confidence interval for the ROI forecast. Null for historical periods.

columns.name: acquisition_cost
columns.description: Historical average acquisition cost for the company in that specific month. Null for forecast periods.

columns.name: acquisition_cost_forecast
columns.description: Projected average acquisition cost for the company in a future month. Null for historical periods.

columns.name: acquisition_cost_lower_bound
columns.description: Lower bound of the 95% confidence interval for the acquisition cost forecast (lower cost is better). Null for historical periods.

columns.name: acquisition_cost_upper_bound
columns.description: Upper bound of the 95% confidence interval for the acquisition cost forecast. Null for historical periods.

columns.name: ctr
columns.description: Historical average Click-Through Rate (CTR) for the company in that specific month (Clicks / Impressions). Null for forecast periods.

columns.name: ctr_forecast
columns.description: Projected average CTR for the company in a future month. Null for historical periods.

columns.name: ctr_lower_bound
columns.description: Lower bound of the 95% confidence interval for the CTR forecast. Null for historical periods.

columns.name: ctr_upper_bound
columns.description: Upper bound of the 95% confidence interval for the CTR forecast. Null for historical periods.

columns.name: is_forecast
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the row represents forecasted data (TRUE) or historical actual data (FALSE).

columns.name: month_name
columns.description: The full name of the calendar month (e.g., 'January').

columns.name: conversion_rate_uncertainty
columns.description: A measure of the relative uncertainty in the conversion rate forecast, calculated as the width of the confidence interval relative to the forecast value. Null for historical periods.

columns.name: roi_uncertainty
columns.description: A measure of the relative uncertainty in the ROI forecast, calculated as the width of the confidence interval relative to the forecast value. Null for historical periods.
